_header: Love thou art of mickle might
_description: An apostrophe to Love (with a religious application) — one 6-line stanza

BLHar7322.Transcription: Loue þou art of mickel mitMi day þou tornis into nit& dos me sike sore and al for on so swete a witþat onis þorw loue me trouþe plitto ben myn euere more
BLHar7322.Note: Written as prose inserted in Latin.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
EETS
         o.s. 15 (1866); repr. 1962; rev. ed. 1903: 232; rev. ed. 262.
